thread.title: Did Grayson Allen Attempt To Try And Trip An Opponent Again Just Days After Getting Unsuspended?
thread.title_full: Did Grayson Allen Attempt To Try And Trip An Opponent Again Just Days After Getting Unsuspended?

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Did Grayson Allen Attempt To Try And Trip An Opponent Again Just Days After Getting Unsuspended?
text:
Duke’s Grayson Allen recently seved a one-game suspension for repeatedly tripping his opponents. 
In his second game back from suspension, many people on the Internet felt Allen attempted to trip Boston College’s Connar Tava when both players got tangled up. 
Back at it again pic.twitter.com/NitMsKG7Sb 
— Tyler Donlan (@TSD163) January 7, 2017 

To me it doesn’t look Allen tried to trip Tava but he does deserve the extra scrutiny considering his past.
